dang po ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje na re | rang ldog rdzas ma grub kyi mtshan nyid ni | chos gang zhigchos gang zhigchos kyi gang zhig mtshan gzhi la ji ltar bkod pa ltar grub cing don ldog
rkyangrkyangkyang par ma grub
pa'o zhe na | bum pa dngos po'i tha snyad du mtshon pa la ba lang gi tha snyad mtshan nyid du bkod pa de rang ldog rdzas ma grub ma yin
par thal | gzhi la grub ma tshang pa'i phyir | 'dod na rang ldog rdzas yod du thal lo || des na rang ldog rdzas ma grub kyi mtshan nyid ni chos gang zhig don ldog rkyangrkyangkyang par ma grub
pa'o ||

lnga pa ni brtson 'grus seng ge na rena rena re || dkar zal mtshan gzhi ba lang gi tha snyad dkar zal kho na la yod par mtshon | nog shal laosgs 'dus pa dkar zla kho na la yod pa mtshan nyid du
bkod pa'i tshe | khyab ches nas mtshan gzhi la mi srid pa yin lo | gang la khyab ches nasnasna mtshan gzhi dkar
zal las gzhan nag sgyur la khyab ches pa yin zer ro ||

dang po ni lo tsha ba na re mtshan nyid kyi skyon 3 du ma 'dus pa rnamrnamrnams bcad med pa zhes bya ba'i skyon gzhan bzhi pa yang yod de | bum pa byas par mtshon pa la rgyu
rkyen las skyes pa'i shes bya mtshan nyid du bkod pa lta bu yin zhes
zer ro || tik chung las |
mtshan nyid rnam bcad la ltos phyir ||
rnam bcad med pa mtshan nyid min zhes so ||

gnyis pa ni rin chen grags na re mtshan nyid kyi skyon thams cad mtshon bya mtshonmtshonmtshan pa'i rgyu mtshan du mi srid par 'dus zer ro || In work (ID:5507), this view is ascribed to Gangs pa she'u (ID:3810).

bdag gi yongs su 'dzin pa na re |na re |na re rdzas chos ldog chos kyi mtshan nyidmtshan nyid(mtshan nyid) ni rim pa bzhinbzhin(bzhin) du rang dang rdzas 1 pa'i chos ma lus pa la khyab byed du brtenbrtenrten pa dang | rang dang rdzas 1 pa'i chos 'ga' zhig la brtenbrtenrten yang 'ga'
zhig la mi
rten pa yin zer ro ||

bgag gi yongs su 'dzin pa na re |na re |na re 'jig medmyedmed la byas yod bkag pa lta bu'i med dgag de rtags kyi bsgrub bya yin zhing rjes dpag gi gzhal bya yin la | 'jig med dang byas'jig myed byas'jig med dang byas
yod kyis stong pa'i tshogs don ma yin dgag de yang rtags kyi
bsgrub bya dang rjes dpag gi gzhal bya yin lo ||
dang po ni lo tsha ba chen po de na re | ljon shing 'gror snang gi shes pa kha dog la tshad ma yin zer ro ||

lo tsha ba ni don dang 'thun par 'dzin pa de yin no || zhe na |des na gcung lo tsha ba ni don dang mthun par 'dzin pa de yin no zhe na |
zla ba 2 'dzin gyi shes pa chos can | don dang mthun par 'dzin pa tsam zhig yin par thal |
shes bya'i don dang mthun par 'dzin pa'i phyir rote || zla ba 2
'dzin kyikyi rnam pa shes bya yin zhing der 'dzin pa'i phyir ro ||
